name: Stealth Squad (automatonvx)
description:
A Short Turn Based Strategy Game for made in 48 Hours for Alakajam  2 game jam, Theme - You Can't see everything  https://alakajam.com/. 

Navigate Your Squad through Alien Environment to find the mysterious artifact and then Back Out To Complete the Mission.

Still a work in progress, future plans include upgrading the artwork and procedural levels.

v1.2 - Post Jam,  added some of the more obvious missing features, mouse based movement, scrollable camera, field of view
